name: Real Cartoon Parking
description:
In this Cartoon parking adventure you and your Lego Driver will try to park buggy car on different parking sport in cartoon city.This fun game is specially designed for little kids. So before you sent your kid of to a parking school or driving school let them play real buggy car parking.
Real cartoon buggy car parking takes place in funny and cartoony designed levels. In each level you and your kid need to find the fastest way to park your cartoon car. Drive around in the different 3D levels. But watch out you don’t crash, scratch our get your car blocked. Park your little car as fast as possible to get the highest score and try to beat your own time.

The levels in this cartoon parking game can be a parking mania or frenzy because the levels are designed to have fun with your kid. No valet will lead you through the cartoon styled levels, the game will get progressively more challenging. This 3D parking game will give you and your kid a serious challenge.

Don't forger to rate us and share with others if you like
